pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the existing layout of the second floor, detailing the arrangement of living spaces such as the living room, dining area, kitchen, and bedrooms. It provides a clear overview of the current floor plan, which is essential for renovation planning. The scale is 3/16" = 1'-0", allowing for detailed examination of spatial relationships.

It provides specifications for lavatories, water closets, and other accessibility elements, guiding the implementation of inclusive design features.

pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES
1. DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION FOR ALL WORK ON THIS PROJECT SHALL CONFORM TO THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE LATEST EDITION OF THE OBC AND THE FOLLOWING:
...
DESIGN LOADS
1. DESIGN LOADS UNFACTORED (U.N.O.) AS NOTED OTHERWISE.
...
CLIMATIC DATA
1. CLIMATIC DATA PRESCRIBED BY OBC
...
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides comprehensive commercial notes, including general construction requirements, design loads, and climatic data. These notes are critical for ensuring that all construction activities comply with the Ontario Building Code and other relevant standards. The sheet serves as a reference for structural and environmental considerations.
